name: Moksha
description: Purify the contents of your soul as they churn throughout numerous lifetimes! Simply reach out left or right as the character traits circle your consciousness and gradually turn the negatives into positives. Only when you've purified your soul can you achieve the liberation known as "Moksha". But the closer you get to enlightenment, the fast the wheel of life spins to throw you off! See how many lifetimes it takes you to succeed.
